page.title: 02LIFE STYLES
page.content: {PUBLIC HOUSES,INNS,BARS. THE ROBIN HOOD Pub is owned by Mitchells and Butler's Brewery.It is run by John and Elizabeth Carlin who live on the premises with their two children Louise and Phillip.Opening hours are 11.00-2.30 and 5.30-11.00 p.m. daily.Sundays 12.00-2.00 and 7.00-10.30p.m.The most popular drinks are beers,wines,whisky,brandy and vodka.Around 200 gallons of beer are sold weekly.A pint of beer costs between 65-80 pence and spirits 62-65 pence per shot.Meals are prepared on the premises,using many home grown vegetables.These range from Â£2.25-Â£4.50 and around 300-400 are sold weekly.8 flavours of crisps are sold at 14 pence per bag.The pub has its own pool table and enters a team in a Birmingham league.Darts,dominoes and cribbage are also played.
